list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the ability to do something or act in a particular way, especially as a faculty or quality.
the capacity or ability to direct or influence the behavior of others or the course of events.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she had me under her power
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đã có tôi dưới sức mạnh của cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: physical strength and force exerted by something or someone.
energy that is produced by mechanical, electrical, or other means and used to operate a device.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: tạo ra sức mạnh từ chất thải

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the time-rate of doing work, measured in watts or less frequently horsepower.
the number of times a certain number is to be multiplied by itself.
supply (a device) with mechanical or electrical energy.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the car is powered by a fuel-injected 3.0-liter engine
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chiếc xe được cung cấp bởi một động cơ 3.0 lít phun nhiên liệu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move or travel with great speed or force.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they powered past the dock toward the mouth of the creek
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ cung cấp năng lượng qua bến tàu về phía miệng của con lạch
